resources.string: Spawns an obstacle in tapped position after charged
Spawns a smoke in tapped position after charged
tap on abilities to show their description
Welcome in Chaos Ping-Pong tutorial. Here you\'ll learn basic mechanics, such as events and abilities.
Controls firstly - to move your platform, simply tap on screen and then your platform will move at this point.
Now abilities - to use them, simply tap on their icon (bottom of the screen). Some abilities have to be used after charging. Try to use chargeable ability called \"Spawn Obstacle\".
Now place it by tapping somewhere in the screen.
Second feature is events. There are two types of them - normal, and global.
This is a normal event. They happens every 15 seconds, and making main chaos in game.
And this is global one. They happens every minute and not reversing.
Here\'s your enemy. And you have to try beat him! use your abilities to make progess. \n Congatulations beating tutorial!
